actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide that dams shall not be considered point sources for purposes of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide that dams or structures intended to impound water shall not be considered point sources for the discharge of pollutants where, upon release of impounded waters, water quality effects result from such impoundment or from the method of release.

titles.title: A bill to provide that dams shall not be considered point sources for purposes of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.
